title: Oxtail soup
ingredients: ['1.3kg beef oxtail', '3 teaspoons salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 onion, chopped', '2 carrots, sliced', '1 parsnip, sliced', '1 turnip, peeled and diced', '2 tablespoons brandy (optional)', '1.5 litres water, divided', '1/2 teaspoon dried savory or dried thyme', '1 bay leaf', '100g barley', '60g dried mushrooms']
